src:
Sopir Penyedot WC Tewas dalam Ledakan Septic Tank di Cakung
05 Nov 2019, 09:44 by Ibnu Hariyanto
Jakarta - Septic tank di sebuah rumah di Jatinegara, Cakung, Jakarta Timur meledak. Kejadian ini menimbulkan korban tewas seorang sopir penyedot WC.
Kanit Reskrim AKP Tomi Siratit saat dihubungi membenarkan adanya kejadian pada Senin (4/11/2019) itu.
"Kecelakaan kerja itu sebenarnya, pelakunya dia, korbannya dia (juga)," ujar Tomi saat dihubungi detikcom, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Bermula, saat korban mendatangi rumah Agus di RT 16/03 Kelurahan Jatinegara, Cakung, Jakarta Timur. Korban diminta datang ke rumah Agus untuk menyerot WC.
Setelah penyedotan selesai, korban mengambil koran lalu membakarnya untuk meyakinkan bahwa proses telah selesai. Koran yang dibakar saat itu padam dan pemilik rumah pun yakin proses telah selesai.
Tidak lama setelah itu, korban mengambil uang dan hendak pamit pulang ke pemilik rumah. Namun tiba-tiba, septic tank meledak dan mengeluarkan suara cukup besar.
Akibat kejadian itu, korban pun terjatuh ke dalam septic tank. Korban pun dinyatakan meninggal dunia.
"Meninggal dunia dengan kondisi luka biasa, nggak terbakar," tandas Romi.
Korban kemudian dibawa ke rumah sakit. Polisi telah melakukan olah tempat kejadian perkara (TKP) dan masih menyelidikinya.

(mea/mea)
text:
The toilet suction driver was killed in a Septic Tank explosion in Cakung
05 Nov 2019, 09:44 by Ibnu Hariyanto
Jakarta - A septic tank in a house in Jatinegara, Cakung, East Jakarta exploded. This incident resulted in the death of a toilet suction driver.
Criminal Investigation Unit AKP Tomi Siratit when contacted confirmed the incident on Monday (11/04/2019).
"The work accident was actually, the culprit he was, the victim he (also)," said Tomi when contacted by AFP on Tuesday (11/05/2019).
It started when the victim came to Agus's house in RT 16/03, Jatinegara Urban Village, Cakung, East Jakarta. The victim was asked to come to Agus's house to drag the toilet.
After the suctioning is complete, the victim takes the newspaper and burns it to make sure that the process is complete. Newspapers that were burned at the time were extinguished and the homeowner was convinced the process was complete.
Not long after that, the victim took the money and wanted to say goodbye to the homeowner. But suddenly, the septic tank exploded and made a big noise.
As a result of the incident, the victim fell into the septic tank. The victim was declared dead.
"Died with an ordinary wound, not burned," said Romi.
The victim was then taken to the hospital. The police have conducted the crime scene (TKP) and are still investigating.

(mea / mea)
